utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Nice to meet you, too. May I ask your name?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Yeah. Urr. My name is XXX02.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: O K. How are you today, Mister XXX02?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ur. Fine, thank you. Urr.  It it my problem is only one. Er.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I see. O K. So, what what's the problem ?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Oh. This is tennis elbow by bad golf.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Umm. But the reason is not tennis, ur but by playing golf .

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: I like very I I like very much.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: How long have you been playing golf?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ummm. Long time. Maybe, twenty years or more.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I see. What is so good about playing golf?

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: What is good about playing golf?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ummm. Urr.  First, urr relax I can feel relax and   good for my health  err and   spent my boring time.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: How often do you play golf?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Umm. Before, urr  twice or three times per month. But this one year, I can't play.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I see. But, where is your favorite golf course?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ummm. Hollin Country in Chiba. Urr. Hollin Country is famous for  competition of companies. Work Japan belong  the com com competition  not pro pro golfer, but urr our urr ur  company or XXX03 or a XXX04 or the companies belong to that competition.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I see. Did you ever take part in a golf competition?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: No, no, no. I'm not so orr not  so good golf player.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: O K. By the way, er where do you live, Mister XXX02?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ur. Now, I'm living  XXX05, XXX06 XXX06, urr XXX07.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: O K. Is it a good place to live?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Umm. I think so.  Umm.  First reason is  I said   near here, and ummm  my very silent ur place  I like my mansion,

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Uh-huh. I see. Do you live in XXX06 with your family?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ur. With  family? No. I'm alone now.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Urr. I'm alone in XXX05. My family is in XXX08 now  because of my girl 's high school. But, next month, urr my wife and my girl my girl no, my daughter will come to XXX05.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: That's good. What are you going to do with them?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ummm. Urr. Maybe, urr  my daughter urr will not go anywhere with me.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Unn I think so. Ur. Sometimes, I will  go to trip or  dinner with my wife. Er. So, when  urr if   dinner, umm my daughter will come, maybe.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I see. Uh-huh. All right. Thank you very much. Now,

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I'd like to show you one picture. Here you are. Please describe the picture for me.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Oh err. My daughter is urr is in her room, and she is talking with urr her fa favorite  dog and cat. Err. Now, she er she must urr  er study hard for  examination for university, but she is very dislike urr studying. So, many times, urr  she urr invite her dog or cat in her room and speak.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: All right. Thank you very much. O K. Umm. Mister XXX02, do you have a computer?

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Ah. I see. O K. Tell me about your computer.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Ummm. My computer is  note P C err  made by N E C. The name is "LaVie". Do you know?

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Then, what do you do with your computer?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Umm. I use  computer only for E-mail.  Err. In in my company, umm E E-mail is uu  must use er must need it, and  I have many business trip, or  so so I decided to buy  P C, before I didn't use any computer.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: But aren't you interested in the Internet?

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Urr. I like face-to-face communication, er but I found urr In Internet  Internet, especially E-mail, is very useful  for us.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: So, now, I use the many times.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: All right. Thank you very much. Now, let's have a role play.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Here you are. This is your card. Please read it to yourself, and, when you are ready, I'll begin.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: I'm a salesclerk at the station, and you're the passenger.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Urr ee. Please urr tell me ee how to buy a ticket to New York.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: You can buy the ticket here.

utterances.speaker: student
utterances.text: Oh urr. I want to urr go to New York. Urr. I'm sorry. Er. Pardon? No, no, no. laughter Urr.  Eee. I want to be  New York urr early, so I want to know what urr   best way to arrive New York early earliest.

utterances.speaker: interviewer
utterances.text: Then, you should take the super express train.

utterances.text: Uh-huh. Yeah. Urr.  ma may I can I buy  super express ticket here?
